DOC.brief_summary: A study Healthy Volunteers Compare Amount R406 Blood When Given Different Formulations Fostamatinib .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Bioequivalence R406 Healthy Volunteers When Given 100mg 150 mg Fostamatinib
DOC.detailed_description: An Open-label , Single-center , Randomized , 4-way Crossover Study Assess Bioequivalence R406 Healthy Volunteers 100 150mg Fostamatinib Administered 13 % Drug-loaded Tablet Versus 38 % Drug-loaded Tablet . Treatment sequence determine use two 2-2 crossover design sequence , 1 treatment A B , 1 treatment C D. The order design contain AB/BA CD/DC within overall design , well order treatment within design , randomize . This give total 8 possible treatment sequence follow : ABCD , ABDC , BACD , BADC , CDAB , CDBA , DCAB , DCBA .
